content.text:
# Slovenian Republic Football Cup

| folded =
| most successful club = MariborOlimpija(both 13 titles)
}}
The Slovenian Republic Football Cup () was the football knockout competition in SR Slovenia within the Yugoslav football system, and served as a qualifier for the main stage of the Yugoslav Cup. After the independence of Slovenia in 1991, it was transformed into the Slovenian Football Cup.
